MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY15 postcode area of Kingskettle. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7:05pm due to a faulty underground cable in Station Court and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:10pm on Monday, 08 March 2021
